https://tmrev.io/movie/492909-Almost Nothing 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9aWlRqtdwNhoSYIpe9qGLi3SErJ.jpg Three stories set on Brazil countryside. In Foice, a weeder becomes head of his group and awakes the envy of his best friend. In Veneno, a cowboy cannot sleep, waiting for the revenge from a enemy of the past. And in Machado, a quiet and rude rose maker decides to end his wife's joy of living. Almost Nothing
